title: Hakushaku-sama wa Amai Yoru ga Osuki
original_name: 伯爵さまは甘い夜がお好き
sinopse:
I love sweets, and my dream is to become a patisserie.

Someone so plain as myself is doing xxx with a handsome Count?!

With a mixture of impact and love so sweet, it'll make your heart ache! The world's no.1 sweet love manga begins!

(Source: AOC Translations!)
